text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>In dem Brandmüllerischen Buchladen wird ein <BIBL><TITLE>Project von Hiorini klugen und verständigen Hauß-Vatter, wie auch avelichem Land-Leben</TITLE>, welches durch Subscriptionen in <VOLUME>2. Folianten</VOLUME> à <PRIZE>6. fl.</PRIZE> gedrucket wird</BIBL>. Ferner ist allda neü fertig worden: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Lutheri</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Bibel</TITLE> mit Figuren in <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT></BIBL>; Item, des Herrn Abbts <BIBL><AUTHOR>Fleury</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Kirchen-Historien</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> aus dem frantzösischen ubersetzt</BIBL>; Item, <BIBL><TITLE>die gantze Pflicht des Menschen</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> aus dem Englischen ubersetzt</BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":7,"explanation":"1. Fixed malformed Unicode characters (√∫ → ü, √ß → ß, √º → ü, √† → à, √∂ → ö) to proper German characters. 2. Moved AUTHOR tag inside TITLE tag since \"von Hiorini\" appears to be part of the title rather than a separate author attribution. 3. Closed the TITLE tag properly before the comma. 4. Added missing opening BIBL tag before \"Fleury\" to properly structure the third bibliographic entry. 5. Changed \"Sub. scriptionen\" to \"Subscriptionen\" (proper word formation). These corrections ensure proper XML structure with balanced tags and restore the original German text."}

Moved AUTHOR tag inside TITLE tag since "von Hiorini" appears to be part of the title rather than a separate author attribution. 3. Closed the TITLE tag properly before the comma. 4. Added missing opening BIBL tag before "Fleury" to properly structure the third bibliographic entry. 5. Changed "Sub. scriptionen" to "Subscriptionen" (proper word formation). These corrections ensure proper XML structure with balanced tags and restore the original German text.
